name: poseidon2-circuit
description: Poseidon2 hash algorithm implementation in circom

scripts.setup: snarkjs groth16 setup poseidon2_accurate.r1cs pot12_final.ptau poseidon2_0000.zkey
scripts.contribute: snarkjs zkey contribute poseidon2_0000.zkey poseidon2_final.zkey --name="1st Contributor Name" -v
scripts.export-verifier: snarkjs zkey export verificationkey poseidon2_final.zkey verification_key.json
scripts.generate-witness: snarkjs wtns calculate poseidon2_accurate.wasm input.json witness.wtns
scripts.generate-proof: snarkjs groth16 prove poseidon2_final.zkey witness.wtns proof.json public.json
scripts.verify-proof: snarkjs groth16 verify verification_key.json public.json proof.json
scripts.full-setup: npm run compile && npm run setup && npm run contribute && npm run export-verifier
scripts.full-proof: npm run generate-witness && npm run generate-proof && npm run verify-proof
